timeline.bodyText:
builder().build() pattern generally makes sense for an immutable object. It seems this is mutable. Given this is mutable, I have concerns with thread safety. You have synchronized sections below, but it is not maintainable because it is easy for someone to get wrong. Making this structure immutable, and make this property an AtomicReference to make it maintainable thread safe.
Also note when you get the parameters, get the structure first, use config = currentConfiguration.get(); then act on config, don't do currentConfiguration.get().fieldAccess();
timeline.author: JamieHunter
